question: Which of the following states the advantage of parenteral drug administration?

answers.option: It has slow-onset and long duration of action
It can provide an immediate effect
It is too slow to be used in an emergency

answers.option: L-iduronic acid and N-acetyl galactosamine sulphate

question: Regarding apoptosis which pair is matched correctly?

answers.option: Let mother take her to faith healer
Try to convince the mother that the father is right
Straightforwardly deny the understanding of the mother
Being a culturally sensitive doctor, don't argue with them
Respect the cultural set values, norms, and rituals
